item.title: Brief Overview of Scan, Query, Select, and Filter of DyanmoDB
item.description: Scan and Query: Amazon DynamoDB has two operations for retrieving data: Scan and Query. Scan retrieves all items in a table, making it inefficient for larger tables. Query is designed to retrieve specific items based on their partition key values, allowing filtering of results.
